thread.title: Immigration fight resumes as funding deadline looms

title: Immigration fight resumes as funding deadline looms
text:
Immigration fight resumes as funding deadline looms 9:44am EDT - 01:49 
As another U.S. government funding deadline looms, a huge spending bill is ground zero in the latest battle between Republicans and Democrats in Congress over President Donald Trump’s push to fund immigration detention centers. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
